channel.title: Sprite Help
channel.description:
Something is wrong with my whip in-game. I'm running off of an OverloadX. When the person holding the whip is being attacked, they're making a weird emote when they get hit, similar to the 2h emote. How can I change it so when they're getting hit by another weapon, the emote will be fixed.
Resent

item.title: Sprite Help
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
